Posts.Content: On 7/21/2007 Krysti wrote: It's DIEP reconstruction and I love mine! Very easy recovery since they do NOT cut muscle like TRAM and LAT.... P.S. If you don't have enough belly, they can do a GAP from your hips too! Hugs & Prayers, Krysti      sorry for the late reply thank you for the info ...did you do a double mass...or just a single....and what size were you and what size did you get....what dr did you use i hope i did not ask 2 many questions... thanks again tina
